review_body: A collectors perspective I‚Äôm a serious photography collector and Artsy is invaluable to me.  It‚Äôs the first place I go to begin researching an artist
Not Working I am unable to add any categories other than the only one I chose when I first opened the APP.  (Impossible to return to that page.) Tried deleting the APP and reopening.

Not as good as before The app was great a while back. Now they removed other features like magazine/news content.  It would have been good to be able to access this news content from the app. You put so much editorial work into it, not sure why you would remove it from being read and to increase readership on that content.

Devs Loss To the devs: Very unfortunate you get featured in Apple Apps and you don‚Äôt feature self representing artists...your loss!  Deleting app...sounds like you have further issues anyway...good luck...perhaps I will redownload if you get it together.

Great Online Market Source This site is well designed, intriguing and responsive with a minimum amount of stress. All parameters of the art transaction are clearly explained by logical tapping on proffered artwork or prompts. Never was I led down a rabbit warren of twists and turns, unable to return to where I started.

Some feedback I love the app, website etc. one thing that would be very helpful is if you could choose a currency to display prices in. While some individuals may have the conversion rate of Swiss francs to usd in their head, I do not.

What happened to the articles??? I downloaded this app so I could read the interesting content Artsy puts out. But with the latest update I don‚Äôt see a way to get to the articles. Please restore this feature so I don‚Äôt have to go to the web separate from the app to read the great information you produce.

My favorite way to discover new artists Using the Artsy app is such a positive part of my day!! I love how it‚Äôs organized, it‚Äôs incredibly easy to use, but best of all it allows me to discover new artists I haven‚Äôt heard of before.

Can‚Äôt access account settings and website doesn‚Äôt work I rarely use this app and decided to delete my account after receiving an email from Artsy about a data security incident. I can‚Äôt do that because there is no way to access my account through the app. I‚Äôve tried to visit their website but it‚Äôs not coming up so I have no way to even reset my password like the email suggested I do.

Very expensive. UX is great and so is the quality of works on the platform. With that said, it's far too expensive to justify the cost. A great up and coming system is called artcloud. Much more affordable and a comparable experience.

‚ô•Ô∏è from Contemporary Collective Gallery! The best art experience on my iPhone! Running my gallery (@contemporarycollectivegallery) an online exclusive gallery, Artsy is crucial for reaching a vast audience of art enthusiasts and artists!

How to read articles? I love the artsy app but every time I try to click on an artsy link from Facebook/my browser it launches the app but doesn‚Äôt open the article. Unless I can‚Äôt figure it out there‚Äôs no way to read the articles on the app. Gave up on many articles because of this
Love Everything but... Absolutely love the content, layout and functionality. Only thing I would like to see is a way to request artist to be added

Facebook articles dead end in artsy app Every time I click on Artsy article in Facebook to read it, it automatically goes and opened my Artsy app but never takes me to the article. Just takes me to my feed of the artist I‚Äôm following. So annoying! I basically have no way of reading any articles unless I open on a lap top.
Wow Absolutely love the new city guide. This is exactly what anyone interested in seeing arts needs!!! I‚Äôm obsessed with maps too, so having them together is the best. Thank you!!!

Enjoyable I enjoy getting updates on artists and their work.  Most items are beyond my price range; or so my wife tells me, however there are pieces I‚Äôd love to own.  However,  I already have so much artwork, I‚Äôve no place to hang new pieces.
Indispensable for art lovers Easy to discover and buy fine art from famous and emerging artists.   Like having every art fair in the world in your pocket.

Magazine Format? I just updated after ages. The old app still worked, and the home was a magazine format with possibly articles and complications, but also large format pictures. Where did that go? It was visually very interesting.

Artsy is the Future of the Art World Whether you are an established or new collector, or if you‚Äôre simply an appreciator right now , Artsy is the one-stop-ship for your digital art appreciating endeavors.
A great way to find out what is going on near me! A great way to find out what is going on in walking distance to my current location.

Absolutely useless! First, they expect you to create an account. I‚Äôm not even sure I like the app yet. I used a fake email and name. Next, the reason I downloaded the app in the first place - to try it out on my walls with VR - doesn‚Äôt even work. The lighting in my room is about as good as you can get, and this can‚Äôt detect my walls. Lame. üëé

Unable to submit artwork to sell Was excited that App offered a way to sell art. Submission page asks to choose artist and it will not save selection. Asks to choose location of art and it will not save selection. Thus always fails on submit.
How I stay arts-savvy! Following my favorite emerging talents lets me stay connected to the art world and make smart investments. Love the alerts when new works are added!
Data breech issues The recent data breach prompted me to reset my password, but now I have lost data from previous email correspondence as well as art pieces that I was following

Perfect for galleries! This app is perfect to display gallery inventory as an Artsy gallery! I highly recommend it as a former gallerist who used Folio for on-the-go situations and in-gallery use for visitors!
Deep linking from emails doesn‚Äôt work Title basically says it all, I get emails from artsy and click on a link, it just opens the app without taking me to the art piece I clicked on.
Beta for viewing art on wall is really cool Hope this becomes a full fledged feature!
Accessible and fun I don‚Äôt even buy, I just scroll through. It‚Äôs like having a museum next to my wallet.
Discover Helps me start with artists I know, learn more about them, and expand from there to learn of new artists
Doesn‚Äôt load since iOS 13 Doesn‚Äôt appear to start on iOS 13. Deleted it, reinstalled. Rebooted, etc.
Love it! Artsy is greatly comprehensive and the best resource I've encountered as an online extracurricular art magazine/pulse on the market.
Could be much better Solid collection but a bit stupid app. No fullscreen for the works, no option for download
Gazing for days This app is a never ending tunnel for art gazers. It‚Äôs fun to casually surf, bid, as well as keep up with the latest events.
Purchased Art Never Received It Beware of purchasing art from this site! I purchased two pieces and never received them. There is no customer service or contact information. Total scam.
Agree! Where are the articles?    The only thing I love to read...GONE?

Why create an art app that won‚Äôt let you discover art? Who created this thing? Ridiculous. Unless you know the name of the artist, you won‚Äôt find anything new using this app because you cannot add categories.

buy and SELL There should be a selling option and i can‚Äôt find it nowhere in the app. I think i saw it when i first opened the app but now it‚Äôs like it never was there. What use is the app this way?
Can‚Äôt sell works You cannot sell works as stated.
Unable to update Doesn‚Äôt refresh with who I unfollow. Keep bringing up works seen long ago in my recently viewed. Cannot let me explore artists in the genre I like.
App is confusing How do you even sell in here can anyone explain please? thank you!
What do you need my email for? There is no reason I can‚Äôt browse the content without an account.
Possible scam I am looking to add to my collection looking to purchase piece and haven‚Äôt heard anything yet very suspicious I ain‚Äôt provided any info please be careful when buying from them
App fails to load any content App fails to load any time i click on content within Artsy‚Äôs emails. Hasn‚Äôt worked for a year now..
Email at launch? Ridiculous You want my email to even launch the app before you establish value.  How moronic.  This is a quick delete.
Unable to list my own creations for sale Not accepting consignments from (my name)
New version does not work! The new version has completely stopped working. Please fix!
App is crashing Latest iOS on iPhone xs - the app is crashing and freezing. Crashes and closes after less than a minute of browsing.

What a let down So I understand this app.  I understand how it can be useful around the world.  For a silent Auction at a fundraiser, not appropriate.  Talking about sucking out the fun in the room and then...the lag time for bidding.  #notcool
Great for artists Not a collector, but it‚Äôs a great tool to catalog contemporary works and influences.
Annoying The app keeps randomly closing. Irritating!
Great App I love the art featured on Artsy.
No more magazine? Downloaded new app ... no more mag ?
Sign up wall just to browse! Deleted
Dudes WHERE THE FEMALES ARTISTS AT?
I can‚Äôt sell my own art It says add artist/designer but I can‚Äôt add myself as an artist.....
Crash App constantly crashes as I scroll thru artwork. I‚Äôm using an iPad.
How come? How come the Artsy app doesn‚Äôt have any of the Artsy articles on it?
Unable to submit info about art I am selling Waste of time. The app keeps failing on me
Bad user interface Their poorly performing UI does not make me want to trust them with my money.
Terrible:( Not able to sell any art! This is terrible someone please help me!

Artsy never fails to blow me away They have taken all of the gorgeous UX and features from the web product and created a lovable pocket sized vsn to use on the go. It is so easy to navigate, the content is excellently curated and the design is simply beautiful. I will spend hours learning, browsing and writing my Christmas list from this wonderful app. I love it!

Bravo! The Artsy app heralds a big step forward not only for mobile app design or the art world, but humankind at large. Nowhere else can one discover such a rich gold mine of formal, verbal, or conceptual inspiration--whether you're completely new to the art world, a die-hard enthusiast, or a serious collector. The typography and iconography are exquisite, the interactions are intuitive and responsive--all while keeping the work center stage. It's a complete rabbit hole in terms of engagement, and will undoubtedly be responsible for a decrease in Instagram browsing, more missed stops on the train--but more broadly, democratizing a world that has remained the purview of a select few for far too long.
Poor display of the art Perhaps I misunderstand how to use the app, but I find it's display of the actual art to be very disappointing.

Great App, but Needs More I love this app, not for the art you can purchase, but for the older works of art I would love for the app to include the history around each work of art. Like the Mona Lisa and how it was made, the myths behind the painting and how it came to be. It would also be great to include even more history about the artist as well. I would as like to see updates of old and new artwork.

A lil problem Hey so love the app it is wonderful! I have grown to appreciate so much more art and mediums than ever before. I do have a concern, for about a month now anytime I try to search for an artist, the app shuts down. I click on the artist's name and the app freezes and then blanks out or something. It tells me when I go into the app to send a report but the problem persists. Help! :)

Beautiful app! I'm not sure what others are complaining about. The pictures are clear and beautiful, and I can easily zoom in and examine sections closely. The app connects flawlessly to the Internet and a simple click lets you sign in with Facebook; just how lazy are we as a culture now?! And as far as the complaint about the artwork, these are current shows and artists work available now; how is this not representative of current art? Many styles and genres are represented and anyone is certain to find some very inspiring treasures. And I love being able to save work to my own "collection" and view over and over. Excellent app!

Beautiful and Inspiring. As an artist, I enjoy observing and learning about different works, new and old. However, my current living arrangements do not allow me to get out to explore this alternate world of shape and color. Artsy has become my favorite app to find inspiration and clarity, while offering more features than some physical museums or galleries can. While I would rather travel to France or Amsterdam to experience these works in person, Artsy has given me the next best thing.  You do not have to be exceptionally educated either, as Artsy offers resources and insight into pieces you may find interesting. I highly recommend this app to anyone who enjoys either making or observing art of all different mediums, movements, and styles.

Smartest Art App I've tried quite a few similar apps and, as both a top-sheet glance and a thoroughly detailed account of what's happening in the contemporary art field, this app far outperforms the others in every way. Of special note is how successfully it maps out the relationships within the art world. I don't know if it's in the search algorithms being used or maybe it's in the nature of the user community the app has attracted, but the links offered, the relationships suggested, and the information flow in general are consistently spot on...both intuitively true and factually accurate. This means not only that the dataset is navigable as a faithful rendering of the art world at any given moment, but also that as I use the app, almost automatically, I encounter precisely the kind of new material I would have otherwise hoped to find. I use this tool daily.

Terrific art resource! I found a marvelous must-have piece within minutes of my first browse, contacted the dealer and bought it PDQ. Good thing I did, and that Nadine Witkin of Gallery Alpha 137 honored my bid, because within a day or so other, she received higher offers. So now I'm de-accessing and looking forward to selling with Artsy too. Highly recommended.

AN ART(SY) WORLD VIEW FROM PHONE! üòç To be able to view all of the art of my favorite artists that I not only did not know ever existed, but never knew I could ever even be able to view is BEYOND a dream come true.  I only hope that, one day, if I am able to get a show for my beauty from the ugliness of the realities of the world that the average [upper middle class] person ignores photography, I will be able to afford to purchase a piece of one of my dreams.  Until then, I will continue to adore ARTSY and praise and learn about the art world from its site.  SHALOM üïä

Beautiful, smooth, and fun A great app for anyone who loves art or wants to learn. I've been a fan of the Artsy desktop site for a long time and am thrilled with the new app as well. I love that you can swipe through your favorites -- it's a fun and cool way to show friends the art I love. Will give five stars when the posting feature arrives!

Indispensable tool for art collectors and enthusiasts A stunning, easy to use app which makes it effortless to navigate the art world. The shows and artworks are limitless and you can see everything from classical antiquity to what Gagosian Gallery brought to Art Basel. Comprehensive and absolutely addictive.

Every Day As a beginning collector, I used Artsy to discover the first major work of art I acquired.  I love the feature which allows you to ask for the price of something directly from a gallery. I also use it to remember the artists and works I like.

An Amazing Art App For professional or beginning artists... or people who just enjoy the visual arts, this is a great app. You can find all categories of artists who work in different mediums, and peruse their masterful art pieces. This app also posts various articles and links. Highly recommend.

Wonder-full assembly: gorgeous lay-outs First, observing the site continuously affords a sense of enjoyment and peace. Coverage of liked characteristics and the ability to further personalize viewing focus, thanks to your attention to feedback, enhances depth of learning and desire to engage, exchange and build appreciation for the beauty and creative skills of numerous, talented individuals.

Useful - and fun - in every way I love Artsy and now own a gorgeous painting because of it. The App enables me to follow artists I like and learn about new ones. And I can connect up to their galleries. So much more to offer and mostly, it gives me my daily art fix and lots of information about what's going on in the art world.

A profound way to experience art A lot could be said about how great this app is, but I'll keep it short by saying Artsy has definitely changed the way I seek out and experience art. Just the ability to follow artists and discover new ones is worth it alone. Thanks Artsy crew!

Fast but missing auction results Artsy's app is one of the best for art and much better than the auction houses own apps.  It's fast, easy to navigate and has great information.  I just wish that the PM would add auction results since it's by far the best feature on the site.

Beautiful, Intuitive, and Worth It. I have enjoyed Artsy's website for years now, and their app is the perfect companion to their great collection. It is beautifully designed, and easy to find new and interesting art. Their recommendations are good, and the shows they display are fascinating. Keep doing great things!

My favorite app Thank you so much for this amazing app.  Exploring thousands of works of art from galleries around the world without leaving my home is a dream come true.  Visiting museums and galleries is one of my favorite activities but I am disabled with limited mobility so your app is very appreciated and valued.
The pandora of art and more! Fantastic app doesn't just help me buy art but also discover new artists. Really amazing stuff. Can't believe it wasn't around before.

Facebook integration glitch I have an account on the website that is linked to Facebook. When I try to login the app just displays a blank screen with a tiny x in the corner. Clicking the x opens a "Facebook credentials failed" error.
The art world on the palm of your hand This brilliant app allows you to track around the world the market for works of favorite artists. The only thing it needs is one click shopping.

Wonderful but crashes This app is amazing, i could spend hours looking through all of the artists' beautiful works. I love all the features it has, but sadly have experienced a lot of crashing while using this app :/ other than that it's great. Please fix that?

Great app for art lovers Tons of well known artists and tons of artists for art lovers to discover. Could have a little more art to show for each artist but still has plenty for your eyeballs to enjoy and your mind to think upon.

Love it but need improve. Your app is great. It's simple and beautiful. But seem that the app has got a issue relates to Sharing. I open Sharing and want to share it on my Facebook, then I close Sharing, now I can't close the keyboard. It's a minor thing and just restart. In general, still highly recommended.

If you like art, this is your app This apps awesome. I'm trying to get into art now and this is the best app to do it with. Only one problem is that I can't save the images for a wallpaper or something like that. Other than that it's great. Very good database
Very Unique App I love this app because you are able to see many pieces of art work for sale or even not for sale by many famous artists. This app also gives me inspiration for my own art work.
A magnificent art app We like everything about it, particularly the notifications about favorite artists. It is a definite must have for anyone that enjoys contemporary art on any level.

Phenomenal Such an incredible app that has afforded me so much access to what I love no matter where I am and no matter my or anyone else's income. I wish only that more people knew about this app and used it. I definitely tell people about it plenty.
Helpful and impressive Beautiful app. Discovered some pretty incredible, hard to find artwork thru Artsy. Seems like the ideal/efficient way to build a collection for the art enthusiasts out there.
Art lover I downloaded this new app yesterday and as a new collector I find it very educational and of superior quality.  I look forward to checking in on my iPhone now.
Beautiful. Amazing. Great to see the art world finally brought mobile.
Beautiful Every time I open the app I discover something amazing. I love the subtle parallax effect when viewing a work on the wall in landscape and on the home view. Very well done!

So excited for a bug fix I'm an art history major and I can't tell you how excited I am for this app! But when I go to galleries, nothing shows up, and the sane thing happens on works you follow; blank. That's all I know of, but I really wish the app worked in it entirety!
art like never before loved it!!!

Useful and easy art app I have tried a dozen or so art focused apps and found that Artsy is the easiest to use and has the broadest base of content to view. It is simple to follow artist or save favorite works. Good job Artsy!

Brilliant This is brilliant app for art lovers, curators, dealers and collectors alike. What the art world needs is transparency, and Artsy delivers it! Attention dealers: price your art. You never know who is lurking out in cyberspace with their checkbook and passion at the ready. ü§î
Love! Great way to browse something besides social media. Gives leads to artists you may like because of who you follow. Can't wait to see how this develops for emerging artists.

Window shopping + Reference Tool I dig Artsy. I'm on it several times a week. I can't really afford the art, but I love it for browsing, research, and dreaming about the art I'd love to have in my house. If I had a house.

New to art Engaging and fluid - it's a maze I'm happy to get lost in. There's only one (practical) way for aspiring collectors to acquire a palate for different art forms and indeed, art in general. It's become clear, this is it.
:thumbsup: Great app! I love how easy Artsy has made it to keep up with the latest shows, view new works by the artists I love, and discover artists and movements I hadn't known about before.
Attractive & Addictive The Artsy app is beautifully designed and it performs seamlessly to bring the world of art to your fingertips. It's educational and a great when you need to kill some time!
Auction results make this app super awesome. The new search interface is nice and having auction results related to the artwork I am viewing makes this a must have for upcoming fairs.
Great way to browse and learn new things Wish it was easier to read posts and learn. Also wouldn't mind being able to set my phone's wallpaper to some of this art.
My Right Brain Says Thanks Great way to discover new art I would have never known about otherwise. Amazing to see how much great art is selling for in my price range!
Lame content and never keeps u logged in Every time I open the app it says create account or log in again through face book- I don't want to do that every time I open this app.
Excellent The Artsy app gives me quick access to article, events and art news. It's a valuable tool for the art collector of any level.
Wonderful. Always puts me into a place of wonder and makes me realize how much creativity and expansive ideas are in our lives past, present, the future.
Best Art Site for Gallery Artists Artsy is great to find art which is currently in an exhibition or was in one. I often find art with techniques that I might incorporate in my own
Beautiful creation It's simplicity brings out the beauty of this app. It's also extremely easy to use. Highly recommend!
Amazing Love everything about this app. I've discovered some of my favorite new artists through the site.
üòç The artsy app is like going to a curated museum on my phone. Discovery features are incredible and the breadth of the collection is amazing. This is easily my favorite app right now!
My new favorite I can get lost in this app looking at all the art. I am an art teacher and I will be using this for inspiration and instruction.
Access to the art world I spend hours on this app exploring the art world. It gives you an unrivaled, first-hand experience.
Love this app! Easy to use with beautiful pictures. I love that I can keep up with my favorite artists and find new and exciting art.
Great way to discover and purchase art I frequently discover new artists, and absolutely love the interface!
Great app for artists, too As an artist myself, I love browsing the works on this app. It gives me great inspiration, as well as an idea of prices of today's artworks.
Incredible database! I couldn't see as much art in a year of going to galleries as I can see in 10 minutes on Artsy! Thanks for the  great resource for collectors!
Great app for artists. Great app for artists. The only place I've found that show pricing information and works.
A work of art Amazing concept, excellent execution and seamless navigation. Now anyone can have the art world and art history in the palm of their hand!
*must* have for art lovers A beautiful app featuring stunning art both from around the world and near you. Download this now!
Beautiful and educational app! If you want to indulge your visual sense and stay informed about latest art events - this app is the best one can have.
Great concept I like being able to keep a list of favorite artists with this app.
Best app for art on the market I am a new collector and curator. Artsy is invaluable to my growth. I recommend Artsy to everyone I meet that is interested in any aspect of the art world.
Useful app I really like Artsy it helps me connect and find new artists. The only problem is the app crushes sometimes besides that this is a app i use everyday

üññ I keep having to log in every time I open the app. It's annoying. Please fix. Other wise, cool concept. Haven't explored much of the app because I'm too annoyed to login again and again, but seems cool. Lovely UI.
Must have art app Very comprehensive list of relevant artist. I like that you can store your favorite artists. The auction price history for various pieces is great.
A great little art app Love this app. I can keep tabs on my favorite artists and learn about artists I hadn't heard of.
Love it If you want to see what's going on in the contemporary art market this is the app for it. Love having collections of artists that inspire me
Beautiful App What a joy to use, you'll get lost scrolling through the most spectacular art.
Amazing discovery tool Beautifully designed app for  people who interact with art daily and people new to art alike! Amazing way to discover new artwork.
Beautiful app for learning about art Can now bid on works in live auctions which is cool. Some of the works seem pretty affordable.
Can't wait to see more updates Beautiful content and simple app. Can't ask for more...üò¨üòêüò¨
So lovely It's as lovely as those summer days at the Hampton's! The breeze of air, the sound of V8 and the colors of my brand new contemporary painting in the back seat! This is luxury!
Finally I don't think you know how long I've been waiting for an app like this. Thank you.
Fantastic A beautifully constructed app that really gives what you looking for in art.
The best app for art Always updated, a lot of information of galleries, artist, price, etc.
Beautiful and Useful There is simply no better way to browse and discover art
One of the best apps for art collectors Artsy is an excellent app to:
Just as beautiful as the main site Impeccable design and the best app out there for browsing art on the go. Will be super useful at fairs too!
Gorgeous The team at Artsy has taken their eye for design and made a truly gorgeous accompaniment to their website.
Amazing app Artsy let's you discover artist you've never heard of in a seamless mobile experience. The app looks clean and minimal.
Like a Taschen book in my hand Flawless images. Intelligent browsing. Perfect even with a 4s!
So convenient! Beautiful UX! Just checked out the new auction functions - looks smooth. Finding so much great art on this app!
Superb art info I love the app. Always keeps me up to date with what is going on in the art world.
Awesome app It's just great to be able to see other peoples artwork as u scroll down the screen
Love this I can't afford any of these paintings but I love being able to see the art!
Poor zooming Glitchy zoom function or for some art works, seemingly non existent zoom function.
Interesting Would be nice to be able to sell artwork too.
Love this app! I'm impressed that they made it even better -- you can now bid in live auctions from the app!
Great! This app is great to just browse. But I would like it better if there was an upload option to post artwork to tumblr
Great way to learn about new artists Nice interface for exploring artwork. It would be even better if it featured the ability to save images and/or share to Tumblr.
Great App For Artists Easy to search by subjects, styles and by media.
Artxtetic about Artsy Always very responsive on my inquiries. Well put together. The features are unbeatable.
Great for Travelers Great app for traveling art lovers who want to keep up to date in museum news around the world.
Six elite reviews Artsy is a great filter for me and this app makes it more accessible to find fast and furiously what I'm looking for.
Fartsy Great app for keeping up with contemporary artists. The quality of the images are great as well!
Great app! Really wonderful app for exploring contemporary art. Keeping up to date on your favorite artists and galleries.
Great app! This is the best art app I've tried. It's hard to believe this much great content is offered for free.
A gallery in my pocket A must for any art lover! Great way to discover and preview shows! I'm obsessed.
Accessible art!! Loving the artsy iPhone app. Great way to find new shows nearby and browse artists!
Simply beautiful Why can't all apps be this easy to use and this beautiful?
Beautiful and functional A pleasure to explore, and a handy tool for viewing the latest auctions, art fairs and exhibitions.
It's cool It's pretty useful to check what's new happening in contemporary art but I prefer their website. This app can be better.
Phenomenal! So many great quality images of modern and contemporary art, really fun to save them!
Seems amazing... But unfortunately, I have no idea. I open the app, click browse and choose a topic, and it immediately force closes. Please fix this issue. It makes the app impossible to use.
One of the best art apps out there This app is so inspiring! It amazes and dazzles me with the sheer amount and quality of the work.
Bad idea with bad thoughts. The one thing that comes to mind is who is actually dumb enough to spend so much money on a app that says you can buy art that cost $50,000 or more.
Invaluable Invaluable art world resource with a stable app and web ui
Beautiful app, great service The new artsy app does not disappoint. Totally gorgeous and will surely become one of my favorites.
Niiice But where's log out option?
Really impressive The new features are really helpful.
Brilliant and addictive! Incredible way to access the art world on the go. Love new bidding functionality!! Wow!
My Inspo Can't afford the art, but as an artist, this app inspires me daily. Many thanks for an excellent resource!
In love Home screen app for me. I learn so much and love browsing through the art.
A beauty I don't know a ton about art but I love just perusing the Artsy site. It is gorgeous and so intuitive. Intelligent design.
Great app Perfect way to discover and stay up to date.
Awesome art app! Great way to keep track of and collect my favorite artists.
Login I have not been able to log in using my email and password through the app, even after changing my password, although I am able to log in on a browser.
